home_page.faq_contact: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
home_page.faq_q1: How to book a flight ticket?
home_page.faq_a1: You can book tickets online via website, mobile app or contact hotline 1900 1886. Just select departure, destination, flight date and number of passengers, then pay securely through various methods.
home_page.faq_q2: What is the carry-on and checked baggage policy?
home_page.faq_a2: Free carry-on baggage up to 7kg (size 56cm x 36cm x 23cm). Checked baggage depends on ticket class, you can buy additional baggage online at better prices than at airport.
home_page.faq_q3: Can I change or cancel my ticket?
home_page.faq_a3: Yes, you can change or cancel tickets according to each ticket class regulations. Change/cancellation fees vary depending on time and ticket type. Early changes are recommended to save costs.
home_page.faq_q4: What is the check-in time online and at airport?
home_page.faq_a4: Online check-in opens 24h before flight and closes 1h before departure. At airport, check-in counter opens 2h and closes 40 minutes before flight. Please arrive early to complete procedures.
home_page.faq_a5: We accept multiple payment methods: credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, JCB), e-wallets (MoMo, ZaloPay, VNPay), bank transfer and payment at agents.

support_page.subtitle: We are ready to support you 24/7. Choose a method to contact the SGU Airline support team.

support_page.faq_q1: How to change or refund a ticket?
support_page.faq_a1: You can change/cancel tickets in 'Manage Booking' or contact our hotline for guidance and to check fare rules.
support_page.faq_q2: How much luggage can I bring?
support_page.faq_a2: Each fare class has different baggage allowance. Please check your ticket details or our baggage services page.
support_page.faq_q3: When should I arrive for check-in?
support_page.faq_a3: We recommend arriving at least 2 hours for domestic and 3 hours for international flights.
